artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Fujiokaya Hikotarō
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 240, chūtanzaku #9.5
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: Poem (Kokinshû 226): Na ni medete/ oreru bakari zo/ ominaeshi/ ware ochiniki to/ hito ni kataru na
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Untitled series of Six Poetic Immortals
title: Sōjō Henjō
